content: @Erik looks like you cut mysqld's usage in half, that's great --thanks
neato, but keep an eye on the slow log, there may be a down side.
for jenkins, um, UseCompressedOops and the usual -Xmx type stuff and see what happens? I have no access, so I'd rather not be the one tweaking...
@Erik the only thing we have using mysql is the wiki, and that's not likely to last a whole lot longer, so we can live with a little slowness (though it's quite responsive at the moment).

@Erik So any outstanding concerns on flipping the switch over to the new server? They keep pinging me every few days, and I've been dragging my feet to switch DNS. But really needs to happen immediately..
I've been keeping the new one up to date with ports, this'd be our last chance if we want to do an OS update again
